returnValues.name: isSupported
returnValues.description: Indicates if navigator.geolocation is available in the environment.

returnValues.name: permissionState
returnValues.description: Current status of the permission: granted, denied, prompt, or unsupported.

returnValues.name: position
returnValues.description: The most recently acquired set of coordinates and accuracy data.

returnValues.name: error
returnValues.description: The error object if the last location request failed.

returnValues.name: getCurrentPosition
returnValues.description: Triggers a one-time requests for the current location.

returnValues.name: watchPosition
returnValues.description: Starts a continuous watch of the position; returns a watcher ID.

returnValues.name: clearWatch
returnValues.description: Stops a watch session using the provided ID.
